data.name: 13 BOSSES
data.detailed_description:
DISCORD


About the Game

Your goal is to survive 15 minutes and beat one of 13 bosses.
Collect coins to unlock new characters, weapons, and abilities. Look for secrets, collect bonuses, and develop your hero!
The game has minimalistic controls and gameplay: you control your hero's movements, and they aim and shoot automatically. Fights take place in closed arenas whose secrets and features you have to learn.
data.about_the_game:
Your goal is to survive 15 minutes and beat one of 13 bosses.
Collect coins to unlock new characters, weapons, and abilities. Look for secrets, collect bonuses, and develop your hero!
The game has minimalistic controls and gameplay: you control your hero's movements, and they aim and shoot automatically. Fights take place in closed arenas whose secrets and features you have to learn.
data.short_description: 13 BOSSES is a rogue-lite survival action game with auto-shooting. Fight against hoards of enemies side by side with your robot dog. Combine weapons and characters to get stronger and be able to defeat all the bosses!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Core i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760, Radeon R9 270
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Core i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060, Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
